column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Poonam - Thank you for your review. Thank you for your kind words regarding our establishment. Please know that if you are ever dissatisfied with your ramen
column2: just let your server know and he or she will make sure everything is up to par. Our Spicy Vegan Ramen comes with tofu
column9: chili oil and sesame seeds. Thank you again
column10: and we hope you'll visit us again in the future.
